How many people are affected by laryngo-onycho-cutaneous syndrome ?,"LOC syndrome is a rare disorder that primarily affects families of Punjabi background from India and Pakistan, although the condition has also been reported in one family from Iran.",GHR,laryngo-onycho-cutaneous syndrome
